name: cloud4firefox
title: cloud4firefox
description: An add-on that changes css based on the preferences defined for Cloud4all
author: Ignacio Peinado - Fundosa Technosite S.A.

preferences.name: invertColours
preferences.title: Invert Colours
preferences.description: If active, invert all colours of the page

preferences.name: backgroundColor
preferences.title: Background color
preferences.description: Colour of the background of the pages

preferences.name: foregroundColor
preferences.title: Foreground color
preferences.description: will change the color of text in all pages

preferences.name: fontSize
preferences.title: Font Size
preferences.description: Mean value of the size of the text (paragraphs, etc.)

preferences.name: magnification
preferences.description: Zoom Level on all pages. Ranges from 1 (100%) onwards (1.5 = 150%, 2 = 200%, etc.)
preferences.title: Magnification Level

preferences.name: simplifier
preferences.title: Simplifier
preferences.description: Removes all unnecessary elements (images, etc.) in all pages
